requiredEquipmentExplanation: The video is titled "30 Min FULL BODY CALISTHENICS WORKOUT at Home | Follow Along," and the tags include "no equipment calisthenics workout," "bodyweight strength workout," and "bodyweight only," all of which strongly indicate that no equipment is needed for this workout.
